name: PotatIO
description:
In the near future, the surface of the earth is ravaged by an apocalyptic event, causing humans to have to live underground. The situation is rough and living standards are low, but with your family's secret potato recipes, perhaps you can save the day.

A survival game in which you live by the potato and die by the potato.

Created by:

Ash Duong (Design, Programming, Art)

Ariel Kim (Sound Design, Composer)
